page.title: 11RECREATION IN CH. MINSHULL
page.content: There is surprisingly little contact between the two communities. The Church has a tower housing six bells. The{bellringers}belong to the Crewe Branch of the Chester Diocesan Guild of Bellringers. They meet on Wednesday evenings for practice and on Sundays for services and other occasions when needed. There are several keen supporters of the{hunt}and Cheshire Hounds and Cheshire Beagles meet here several times between November and March.The The Weaver is fished by several {angling clubs.}The South Cheshire branch of the{Pony Club}meet regularly at Manor Farm,Lea Green for competition work, including a tetrathlon event. A small group have formed an{Archery Club. Several members of the community{shoot (either clay pigeons or live game)
